00042 /* btSoftBodyWorldInfo  */ 
00043 struct  btSoftBodyWorldInfo
00044 {
00045         btScalar                                air_density;
00046         btScalar                                water_density;
00047         btScalar                                water_offset;
00048         btScalar                                m_maxDisplacement;
00049         btVector3                               water_normal;
00050         btBroadphaseInterface*  m_broadphase;
00051         btDispatcher*   m_dispatcher;
00052         btVector3                               m_gravity;
00053         btSparseSdf<3>                  m_sparsesdf;
00054 
00055         btSoftBodyWorldInfo()
00056                 :air_density((btScalar)1.2),
00057                 water_density(0),
00058                 water_offset(0),
00059                 m_maxDisplacement(1000.f),//avoid soft body from 'exploding' so use some upper threshold of maximum motion that a node can travel per frame
00060                 water_normal(0,0,0),
00061                 m_broadphase(0),
00062                 m_dispatcher(0),
00063                 m_gravity(0,-10,0)
00064         {
00065         }
00066 };

00201         /* Base type    */ 
00202         struct  Element
00203         {
00204                 void*                   m_tag;                  // User data
00205                 Element() : m_tag(0) {}
00206         };
00207         /* Material             */ 
00208         struct  Material : Element
00209         {
00210                 btScalar                                m_kLST;                 // Linear stiffness coefficient [0,1]
00211                 btScalar                                m_kAST;                 // Area/Angular stiffness coefficient [0,1]
00212                 btScalar                                m_kVST;                 // Volume stiffness coefficient [0,1]
00213                 int                                             m_flags;                // Flags
00214         };
00215 
00216         /* Feature              */ 
00217         struct  Feature : Element
00218         {
00219                 Material*                               m_material;             // Material
00220         };
00221         /* Node                 */ 
00222         struct  Node : Feature
00223         {
00224                 btVector3                               m_x;                    // Position
00225                 btVector3                               m_q;                    // Previous step position
00226                 btVector3                               m_v;                    // Velocity
00227                 btVector3                               m_f;                    // Force accumulator
00228                 btVector3                               m_n;                    // Normal
00229                 btScalar                                m_im;                   // 1/mass
00230                 btScalar                                m_area;                 // Area
00231                 btDbvtNode*                             m_leaf;                 // Leaf data
00232                 int                                             m_battach:1;    // Attached
00233         };
00234         /* Link                 */ 
00235         ATTRIBUTE_ALIGNED16(struct)     Link : Feature
00236         {
00237                 btVector3                               m_c3;                   // gradient
00238                 Node*                                   m_n[2];                 // Node pointers
00239                 btScalar                                m_rl;                   // Rest length          
00240                 int                                             m_bbending:1;   // Bending link
00241                 btScalar                                m_c0;                   // (ima+imb)*kLST
00242                 btScalar                                m_c1;                   // rl^2
00243                 btScalar                                m_c2;                   // |gradient|^2/c0
00244         
00245                 BT_DECLARE_ALIGNED_ALLOCATOR();
00246 
00247         };
00248         /* Face                 */ 
00249         struct  Face : Feature
00250         {
00251                 Node*                                   m_n[3];                 // Node pointers
00252                 btVector3                               m_normal;               // Normal
00253                 btScalar                                m_ra;                   // Rest area
00254                 btDbvtNode*                             m_leaf;                 // Leaf data
00255         };
00256         /* Tetra                */ 
00257         struct  Tetra : Feature
00258         {
00259                 Node*                                   m_n[4];                 // Node pointers                
00260                 btScalar                                m_rv;                   // Rest volume
00261                 btDbvtNode*                             m_leaf;                 // Leaf data
00262                 btVector3                               m_c0[4];                // gradients
00263                 btScalar                                m_c1;                   // (4*kVST)/(im0+im1+im2+im3)
00264                 btScalar                                m_c2;                   // m_c1/sum(|g0..3|^2)
00265         };
00266         /* RContact             */ 
00267         struct  RContact
00268         {
00269                 sCti            m_cti;                  // Contact infos
00270                 Node*                                   m_node;                 // Owner node
00271                 btMatrix3x3                             m_c0;                   // Impulse matrix
00272                 btVector3                               m_c1;                   // Relative anchor
00273                 btScalar                                m_c2;                   // ima*dt
00274                 btScalar                                m_c3;                   // Friction
00275                 btScalar                                m_c4;                   // Hardness
00276         };
00277         /* SContact             */ 
00278         struct  SContact
00279         {
00280                 Node*                                   m_node;                 // Node
00281                 Face*                                   m_face;                 // Face
00282                 btVector3                               m_weights;              // Weigths
00283                 btVector3                               m_normal;               // Normal
00284                 btScalar                                m_margin;               // Margin
00285                 btScalar                                m_friction;             // Friction
00286                 btScalar                                m_cfm[2];               // Constraint force mixing
00287         };
00288         /* Anchor               */ 
00289         struct  Anchor
00290         {
00291                 Node*                                   m_node;                 // Node pointer
00292                 btVector3                               m_local;                // Anchor position in body space
00293                 btRigidBody*                    m_body;                 // Body
00294                 btScalar                                m_influence;
00295                 btMatrix3x3                             m_c0;                   // Impulse matrix
00296                 btVector3                               m_c1;                   // Relative anchor
00297                 btScalar                                m_c2;                   // ima*dt
00298         };

00321         /* Cluster              */ 
00322         struct  Cluster
00323         {
00324                 tScalarArray                            m_masses;
00325                 btAlignedObjectArray<Node*>     m_nodes;                
00326                 tVector3Array                           m_framerefs;
00327                 btTransform                                     m_framexform;
00328                 btScalar                                        m_idmass;
00329                 btScalar                                        m_imass;
00330                 btMatrix3x3                                     m_locii;
00331                 btMatrix3x3                                     m_invwi;
00332                 btVector3                                       m_com;
00333                 btVector3                                       m_vimpulses[2];
00334                 btVector3                                       m_dimpulses[2];
00335                 int                                                     m_nvimpulses;
00336                 int                                                     m_ndimpulses;
00337                 btVector3                                       m_lv;
00338                 btVector3                                       m_av;
00339                 btDbvtNode*                                     m_leaf;
00340                 btScalar                                        m_ndamping;     /* Node damping         */ 
00341                 btScalar                                        m_ldamping;     /* Linear damping       */ 
00342                 btScalar                                        m_adamping;     /* Angular damping      */ 
00343                 btScalar                                        m_matching;
00344                 btScalar                                        m_maxSelfCollisionImpulse;
00345                 btScalar                                        m_selfCollisionImpulseFactor;
00346                 bool                                            m_containsAnchor;
00347                 bool                                            m_collide;
00348                 int                                                     m_clusterIndex;
00349                 Cluster() : m_leaf(0),m_ndamping(0),m_ldamping(0),m_adamping(0),m_matching(0) 
00350                 ,m_maxSelfCollisionImpulse(100.f),
00351                 m_selfCollisionImpulseFactor(0.01f),
00352                 m_containsAnchor(false)
00353                 {}
00354         };
00355         /* Impulse              */ 
00356         struct  Impulse
00357         {
00358                 btVector3                                       m_velocity;
00359                 btVector3                                       m_drift;
00360                 int                                                     m_asVelocity:1;
00361                 int                                                     m_asDrift:1;
00362                 Impulse() : m_velocity(0,0,0),m_drift(0,0,0),m_asVelocity(0),m_asDrift(0)       {}
00363                 Impulse                                         operator -() const
00364                 {
00365                         Impulse i=*this;
00366                         i.m_velocity=-i.m_velocity;
00367                         i.m_drift=-i.m_drift;
00368                         return(i);
00369                 }
00370                 Impulse                                         operator*(btScalar x) const
00371                 {
00372                         Impulse i=*this;
00373                         i.m_velocity*=x;
00374                         i.m_drift*=x;
00375                         return(i);
00376                 }
00377         };
00378         /* Body                 */ 
00379         struct  Body
00380         {
00381                 Cluster*                        m_soft;
00382                 btRigidBody*            m_rigid;
00383                 const btCollisionObject*        m_collisionObject;
00384 
00385                 Body() : m_soft(0),m_rigid(0),m_collisionObject(0)                              {}
00386                 Body(Cluster* p) : m_soft(p),m_rigid(0),m_collisionObject(0)    {}
00387                 Body(const btCollisionObject* colObj) : m_soft(0),m_collisionObject(colObj)
00388                 {
00389                         m_rigid = (btRigidBody*)btRigidBody::upcast(m_collisionObject);
00390                 }
00391 
00392                 void                                            activate() const
00393                 {
00394                         if(m_rigid) 
00395                                 m_rigid->activate();
00396                         if (m_collisionObject)
00397                                 m_collisionObject->activate();
00398 
00399                 }
00400                 const btMatrix3x3&                      invWorldInertia() const
00401                 {
00402                         static const btMatrix3x3        iwi(0,0,0,0,0,0,0,0,0);
00403                         if(m_rigid) return(m_rigid->getInvInertiaTensorWorld());
00404                         if(m_soft)      return(m_soft->m_invwi);
00405                         return(iwi);
00406                 }
00407                 btScalar                                        invMass() const
00408                 {
00409                         if(m_rigid) return(m_rigid->getInvMass());
00410                         if(m_soft)      return(m_soft->m_imass);
00411                         return(0);
00412                 }
00413                 const btTransform&                      xform() const
00414                 {
00415                         static const btTransform        identity=btTransform::getIdentity();            
00416                         if(m_collisionObject) return(m_collisionObject->getWorldTransform());
00417                         if(m_soft)      return(m_soft->m_framexform);
00418                         return(identity);
00419                 }
00420                 btVector3                                       linearVelocity() const
00421                 {
00422                         if(m_rigid) return(m_rigid->getLinearVelocity());
00423                         if(m_soft)      return(m_soft->m_lv);
00424                         return(btVector3(0,0,0));
00425                 }
00426                 btVector3                                       angularVelocity(const btVector3& rpos) const
00427                 {                       
00428                         if(m_rigid) return(btCross(m_rigid->getAngularVelocity(),rpos));
00429                         if(m_soft)      return(btCross(m_soft->m_av,rpos));
00430                         return(btVector3(0,0,0));
00431                 }
00432                 btVector3                                       angularVelocity() const
00433                 {                       
00434                         if(m_rigid) return(m_rigid->getAngularVelocity());
00435                         if(m_soft)      return(m_soft->m_av);
00436                         return(btVector3(0,0,0));
00437                 }
00438                 btVector3                                       velocity(const btVector3& rpos) const
00439                 {
00440                         return(linearVelocity()+angularVelocity(rpos));
00441                 }
00442                 void                                            applyVImpulse(const btVector3& impulse,const btVector3& rpos) const
00443                 {
00444                         if(m_rigid)     m_rigid->applyImpulse(impulse,rpos);
00445                         if(m_soft)      btSoftBody::clusterVImpulse(m_soft,rpos,impulse);
00446                 }
00447                 void                                            applyDImpulse(const btVector3& impulse,const btVector3& rpos) const
00448                 {
00449                         if(m_rigid)     m_rigid->applyImpulse(impulse,rpos);
00450                         if(m_soft)      btSoftBody::clusterDImpulse(m_soft,rpos,impulse);
00451                 }               
00452                 void                                            applyImpulse(const Impulse& impulse,const btVector3& rpos) const
00453                 {
00454                         if(impulse.m_asVelocity)        
00455                         {
00456 //                              printf("impulse.m_velocity = %f,%f,%f\n",impulse.m_velocity.getX(),impulse.m_velocity.getY(),impulse.m_velocity.getZ());
00457                                 applyVImpulse(impulse.m_velocity,rpos);
00458                         }
00459                         if(impulse.m_asDrift)           
00460                         {
00461 //                              printf("impulse.m_drift = %f,%f,%f\n",impulse.m_drift.getX(),impulse.m_drift.getY(),impulse.m_drift.getZ());
00462                                 applyDImpulse(impulse.m_drift,rpos);
00463                         }
00464                 }
00465                 void                                            applyVAImpulse(const btVector3& impulse) const
00466                 {
00467                         if(m_rigid)     m_rigid->applyTorqueImpulse(impulse);
00468                         if(m_soft)      btSoftBody::clusterVAImpulse(m_soft,impulse);
00469                 }
00470                 void                                            applyDAImpulse(const btVector3& impulse) const
00471                 {
00472                         if(m_rigid)     m_rigid->applyTorqueImpulse(impulse);
00473                         if(m_soft)      btSoftBody::clusterDAImpulse(m_soft,impulse);
00474                 }
00475                 void                                            applyAImpulse(const Impulse& impulse) const
00476                 {
00477                         if(impulse.m_asVelocity)        applyVAImpulse(impulse.m_velocity);
00478                         if(impulse.m_asDrift)           applyDAImpulse(impulse.m_drift);
00479                 }
00480                 void                                            applyDCImpulse(const btVector3& impulse) const
00481                 {
00482                         if(m_rigid)     m_rigid->applyCentralImpulse(impulse);
00483                         if(m_soft)      btSoftBody::clusterDCImpulse(m_soft,impulse);
00484                 }
00485         };
00486         /* Joint                */ 
00487         struct  Joint
00488         {
00489                 struct eType { enum _ {
00490                         Linear=0,
00491                         Angular,
00492                         Contact
00493                 };};
00494                 struct Specs
00495                 {
00496                         Specs() : erp(1),cfm(1),split(1) {}
00497                         btScalar        erp;
00498                         btScalar        cfm;
00499                         btScalar        split;
00500                 };
00501                 Body                                            m_bodies[2];
00502                 btVector3                                       m_refs[2];
00503                 btScalar                                        m_cfm;
00504                 btScalar                                        m_erp;
00505                 btScalar                                        m_split;
00506                 btVector3                                       m_drift;
00507                 btVector3                                       m_sdrift;
00508                 btMatrix3x3                                     m_massmatrix;
00509                 bool                                            m_delete;
00510                 virtual                                         ~Joint() {}
00511                 Joint() : m_delete(false) {}
00512                 virtual void                            Prepare(btScalar dt,int iterations);
00513                 virtual void                            Solve(btScalar dt,btScalar sor)=0;
00514                 virtual void                            Terminate(btScalar dt)=0;
00515                 virtual eType::_                        Type() const=0;
00516         };
00517         /* LJoint               */ 
00518         struct  LJoint : Joint
00519         {
00520                 struct Specs : Joint::Specs
00521                 {
00522                         btVector3       position;
00523                 };              
00524                 btVector3                                       m_rpos[2];
00525                 void                                            Prepare(btScalar dt,int iterations);
00526                 void                                            Solve(btScalar dt,btScalar sor);
00527                 void                                            Terminate(btScalar dt);
00528                 eType::_                                        Type() const { return(eType::Linear); }
00529         };
00530         /* AJoint               */ 
00531         struct  AJoint : Joint
00532         {
00533                 struct IControl
00534                 {
00535                         virtual ~IControl() {}
00536                         virtual void                    Prepare(AJoint*)                                {}
00537                         virtual btScalar                Speed(AJoint*,btScalar current) { return(current); }
00538                         static IControl*                Default()                                               { static IControl def;return(&def); }
00539                 };
00540                 struct Specs : Joint::Specs
00541                 {
00542                         Specs() : icontrol(IControl::Default()) {}
00543                         btVector3       axis;
00544                         IControl*       icontrol;
00545                 };              
00546                 btVector3                                       m_axis[2];
00547                 IControl*                                       m_icontrol;
00548                 void                                            Prepare(btScalar dt,int iterations);
00549                 void                                            Solve(btScalar dt,btScalar sor);
00550                 void                                            Terminate(btScalar dt);
00551                 eType::_                                        Type() const { return(eType::Angular); }
00552         };
00553         /* CJoint               */

00566         /* Config               */ 
00567         struct  Config
00568         {
00569                 eAeroModel::_                   aeromodel;              // Aerodynamic model (default: V_Point)
00570                 btScalar                                kVCF;                   // Velocities correction factor (Baumgarte)
00571                 btScalar                                kDP;                    // Damping coefficient [0,1]
00572                 btScalar                                kDG;                    // Drag coefficient [0,+inf]
00573                 btScalar                                kLF;                    // Lift coefficient [0,+inf]
00574                 btScalar                                kPR;                    // Pressure coefficient [-inf,+inf]
00575                 btScalar                                kVC;                    // Volume conversation coefficient [0,+inf]
00576                 btScalar                                kDF;                    // Dynamic friction coefficient [0,1]
00577                 btScalar                                kMT;                    // Pose matching coefficient [0,1]              
00578                 btScalar                                kCHR;                   // Rigid contacts hardness [0,1]
00579                 btScalar                                kKHR;                   // Kinetic contacts hardness [0,1]
00580                 btScalar                                kSHR;                   // Soft contacts hardness [0,1]
00581                 btScalar                                kAHR;                   // Anchors hardness [0,1]
00582                 btScalar                                kSRHR_CL;               // Soft vs rigid hardness [0,1] (cluster only)
00583                 btScalar                                kSKHR_CL;               // Soft vs kinetic hardness [0,1] (cluster only)
00584                 btScalar                                kSSHR_CL;               // Soft vs soft hardness [0,1] (cluster only)
00585                 btScalar                                kSR_SPLT_CL;    // Soft vs rigid impulse split [0,1] (cluster only)
00586                 btScalar                                kSK_SPLT_CL;    // Soft vs rigid impulse split [0,1] (cluster only)
00587                 btScalar                                kSS_SPLT_CL;    // Soft vs rigid impulse split [0,1] (cluster only)
00588                 btScalar                                maxvolume;              // Maximum volume ratio for pose
00589                 btScalar                                timescale;              // Time scale
00590                 int                                             viterations;    // Velocities solver iterations
00591                 int                                             piterations;    // Positions solver iterations
00592                 int                                             diterations;    // Drift solver iterations
00593                 int                                             citerations;    // Cluster solver iterations
00594                 int                                             collisions;             // Collisions flags
00595                 tVSolverArray                   m_vsequence;    // Velocity solvers sequence
00596                 tPSolverArray                   m_psequence;    // Position solvers sequence
00597                 tPSolverArray                   m_dsequence;    // Drift solvers sequence
00598         };
00599         /* SolverState  */ 
00600         struct  SolverState
00601         {
00602                 btScalar                                sdt;                    // dt*timescale
00603                 btScalar                                isdt;                   // 1/sdt
00604                 btScalar                                velmrg;                 // velocity margin
00605                 btScalar                                radmrg;                 // radial margin
00606                 btScalar                                updmrg;                 // Update margin
00607         };      
00609         struct  RayFromToCaster : btDbvt::ICollide
00610         {
00611                 btVector3                       m_rayFrom;
00612                 btVector3                       m_rayTo;
00613                 btVector3                       m_rayNormalizedDirection;

00617                 RayFromToCaster(const btVector3& rayFrom,const btVector3& rayTo,btScalar mxt);

00620                 static /*inline*/ btScalar      rayFromToTriangle(const btVector3& rayFrom,

00907         // Set the solver that handles this soft body
00908         // Should not be allowed to get out of sync with reality
00909         // Currently called internally on addition to the world

00936         static const btSoftBody*        upcast(const btCollisionObject* colObj)
00937         {
00938                 if (colObj->getInternalType()==CO_SOFT_BODY)
00939                         return (const btSoftBody*)colObj;
00940                 return 0;
00941         }
00942         static btSoftBody*                      upcast(btCollisionObject* colObj)
00943         {
00944                 if (colObj->getInternalType()==CO_SOFT_BODY)
00945                         return (btSoftBody*)colObj;
00946                 return 0;
00947         }
